strings: <voice_0x01000F97><se_low>The Seer: Ah, hello there. It's been quite some time since I've had any visitors.

<voice_0x01000F98><se_low>The Seer: And what have we here?
Ooh, such an exquisite beauty!
<voice_0x01000F99><se_low>The Seer: I saw many a beautiful princess back at the castle, but you, my dear, oh, you outshine them all. Indeed... Oh, indeed...
<voice_0x01000F9A><se_low>The Seer: It's easy to see why your fellow travellers guard you so closely.
<voice_0x01000F9B><se_low>Yangus: Wot!? You sayin' you can see the 'orse-princess all proper like!?
<voice_0x01000F9C><se_low>King Trode: Of course he can! Even as a horse, her inner beauty shines through! That's right, my darling...
<voice_0x01000F9D><se_low>King Trode: Wait a moment! How CAN you recognise this horse as my beautiful Princess?
<voice_0x01000F9E><se_low>The Seer: A horse, you say? How curious!
<voice_0x01000F9F><se_low>The Seer: Please excuse me, Princess.

<voice_0x01000FA0><se_low>The Seer: Indeed, here is her mane... And her tail!
She is a horse. Curiouser and curiouser!

<voice_0x01000FA1><se_low>The Seer: As you can see, my sight failed me long ago.
Now I view the world through my mind's eye instead.

<voice_0x01000FA2><se_low>The Seer: And what it sees is a princess,
not a beast of burden!
<voice_0x01000FA3><se_low>The Seer: Curious travellers, might you tell me what has happened here?
<voice_0x01000FA4><se_low>The Seer: I see. So a curse has been placed upon her.
<voice_0x01000FA5><se_low>The Seer: Now. I may just have a way to return her to her former self. Yes, yes. Why don't we give it a try?

<voice_0x01000FA6><se_low>King Trode: Really?
Where? How!?

<voice_0x01000FA7><se_low>Yangus: COR BLIMEY!
Don't sneak up on me like that!

<voice_0x01000FA8><se_low>King Trode: What are you flapping about!?
I've been here the whole time, you twit!

<voice_0x01000FA9><se_low>The Seer: I can't say for sure if it will work,
but have her drink from the spring.
<voice_0x01000FAA><se_low>The Seer: Its enchanted waters have been known to lift curses. Why don't you try it and see?
<voice_0x01000FAB><se_high>Princess Medea: Father...!?

<voice_0x01000FAC><se_high>Princess Medea: Father! Look!
I've returned to normal!

<voice_0x01000FAD><se_high>Princess Medea: What's wrong, Father?
Why aren't you saying anything?
Am I just dreaming?
<voice_0x01000FAE><se_high>Princess Medea: Or is this some new trickery?

<voice_0x01000FAF><se_low>King Trode: No, no, my dear! I'm sorry.
It's just that you take my breath away.
<voice_0x01000FB0><se_low>King Trode: Come here and let me look at you!
<voice_0x01000FB1><se_high>Princess Medea: Oh, Father!
<voice_0x01000FB2><se_low>King Trode: Medea! My darling Medea...

<voice_0x01000FB3><se_low>King Trode: I'm so sorry for making you pull the carriage.
It must have been so hard for you.
I promise, I'll make it up to you!

<voice_0x01000FB4><se_high>Princess Medea: Oh, no, Father!
You mustn't worry!
This isn't just about me.

<voice_0x01000FB5><se_high>Princess Medea: I'm just happy that I could be of service
to everyone.
<voice_0x01000FB6><se_low>King Trode: That's my Medea. Well, it's high time I restored my own visage to its former glory!
<voice_0x01000FB7><se_high>Princess Medea: Father!? Aaaah!
<voice_0x01000FB8><se_low>King Trode: Hm? What's wrong!?
<voice_0x01000FB9><se_low>King Trode: Medea!
<voice_0x01000FBA><se_low>King Trode: Oh, my Princess...

<voice_0x01000FBB><se_low>King Trode: What is this new devilry?
It seems our celebrations were premature...
<voice_0x01000FBC><se_low>The Seer: Hm... The curse placed upon the Princess must be strong indeed.
<voice_0x01000FBD><se_low>The Seer: If the waters don't work, there is but one path left open to you.
<voice_0x01000FBE><se_low>The Seer: You must find and defeat the one who placed the curse upon her. Dhoulmagus.
<voice_0x01000FBF><se_low>The Seer: It is the only way to restore the Princess to her true form. You must persevere, no matter how long and hard the road ahead.

<voice_0x01000FC0><se_low>The Seer: And now I pray you'll excuse me.
My old bones get chilled so easily...
